description:
A lone dwarf follows a peculiar white cricket through dark tunnels and stumbles upon the entrance to a long
forgotten, ancient forge. Find the anvil, bellows, and hammer and use silver to forge silver bolts for the
magic crossbow to destroy the barrier to the sealed hall and defeat Big Wizard.

v1.0.0.description:
A Rogue and Legend of Zelda inspired bumpRPG where you explore Dwarven tunnels and collect the items necessary to defeat the Big Wizard. This archipelago implementation shuffles 52 chests, the map check, and the forge check for a total of 54 checks. 

### Archipelago Setup

Follow our [setup instructions here](https://github.com/cheesepak/ap-forged-curse?tab=readme-ov-file#-how-to-play-archipelago--randomizer]). 

### Launching the Forged Curse Client

The index.html file in `client.zip` can be opened in any web browser, then submit the Hostname, Port, and Name for the connection

An example:

    Hostname: archipelago.gg
    Port: 38281
    Name: Player1

You will then see a `Connected` message showing that you have connected properly, and you can continue to play the game.

### Running the game

Refreshing / navigating away from the client page or resetting the cart will clear map progress. All links on the client page open in a new window.
v1.0.0.title: Initial Release

v1.0.1.description:
A variety of hotfixes based on feedback and testing from the AP community

## Game
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed grappling hook death loop
- Fixed HP not returning to max on respawn
- Fixed using blink rod to traverse out of bounds
- Fixed bolt drops giving 20 instead of 1
- Fixed kobold respawning glitch

## Client / Compendium
### New
- Added an additional, unaltered map to the **Vanilla Map** section of the Compendium

### Changes
- Made changes to the chest locations and regions maps for better readability
- Clarified how to get to the River Fortress from the Kobold Village in the vanilla walkthrough 
- Changed colors of the chest numbers in the walkthrough to more closely reflect the chest locations map

---

v1.0.1.title: Post-release Hotfixes

v1.0.2.description:
A second set of hotfixes. Shout out to M-Cool and others on the AP discord for playtesting and finding bugs!

## Game
### Changes
- Reinforced door behind barrier to prevent specific out of logic skip with blink rod
- Corrected some map errors and made other minor upgrades to the map

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed crash when using a certain item on respawned corrupted kobold
- Fixed crash on selecting blank item in inventory

### Known Issues
- Blank item sometimes appears in inventory. Unsure what causes it to appear.

## APWorld
### Changes
- Updated missing logic with regard to bombs

---

v1.0.2.title: Hotfixes... 2!

v1.0.3.description:
This time, a AP focused hotfix.

## Game
### Changes
- Changed the sprite of a tile

### Known Issues
- Blank item sometimes appears in inventory. Unsure what causes it to appear.

## Client
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed discrepancies between some item IDs in APWorld and Client

## APWorld
### Bug Fixes
- Changed logic to make sure gold armor is a progression item

---

v1.0.3.title: Another hotfix hot off the grill

v1.0.4.description:
Thanks again to the AP community for hunting out these bugs.

## APWorld
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed game sometimes generating with one more item than locations available

---

v1.0.4.title: Small fix to APWorld

v1.1.0-beta.description:
Two new options for randomizer logic have been added to the YAML:
- **Barrier Skip**: An unintended skip was found during playtesting and now this skip can optionally be in logic. Use the Blink Rod or Grappling Hook and the White Key to access the Sealed Halls.
- **Damage Boosting**: Adds logic for tanking snails at the beginning of the game and tanking spikes to get to areas normally requiring other items (mostly the grappling hook). 

A special thanks to M-Cool on the Archipelago discord for encouraging the inclusion of these options and gathering logic data to expedite the process.

**Note**: Unstable Release. Generate at your own risk.

## APWorld
### Changes
- Added new Barrier Skip and Damage Boosting options
- Added APWorld manifest
- Changed the way APWorld handles logic generation to allow for new options

## YAML
### Changes
- Added Barrier Skip and Damage Boosting options 
### Bug Fixes
- Start_inventory in YAML enabled
### Known Issues
- Start_inventory not handled so it only works with adding a single item

## Client
### Changes
- Added full list of chests and vanilla items under the vanilla chest map
- Added information about AP and the new AP options
- Changed Eyebat's text from "Sleeping Bat" to "Sleeping Eyebat"
### Bug Fixes
- Replaced special characters with Unicode

## Game
### Changes
- Added barrels in the New Moon Rotunda for the grappling hook once acquired. 
### Known Issues
- Blank item sometimes appears in inventory. Unsure what causes it to appear.

---

v1.1.0-beta.1.description:
Small bug fix as we investigate instability issues.

**Note**: Unstable Release. Generate at your own risk.

## APWorld
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed damage boost logic for nmr left chest and nmr right chest
- Fixed invalid manifest

## YAML
### Changes
- Commented out deathlink and plando_items
v1.1.0-beta.1.title: Fix logic for damage boost
